verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329><s%> Musician, <S%H5329><s%> A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%> In you, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> do I put my trust; <S%H2620><s%> let me never <S%H408><s%> <S%H3808><s%> be ashamed: <S%H954><s%> deliver <S%H6403><s%> me in your righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>

Bow <S%H5186><s%> down <S%H5186><s%> your ear <S%H241><s%> to me; deliver <S%H5337><s%> me speedily: <S%H4120><s%> be you my strong <S%H4581><s%> rock, <S%H6697><s%> for an house <S%H1004><s%> of defense <S%H4686><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> me.
For you are my rock <S%H5553><s%> and my fortress; <S%H4686><s%> therefore for your name's <S%H8034><s%> sake <S%H4616><s%> lead <S%H5148><s%> me, and guide <S%H5095><s%> me.
Pull <S%H3318><s%> me out of the net <S%H7568><s%> that they have laid <S%H2934><s%> privately <S%H2934><s%> for me: for you are my strength. <S%H4581><s%>
Into your hand <S%H3027><s%> I commit <S%H6485><s%> my spirit: <S%H7307><s%> you have redeemed <S%H6299><s%> me, O LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H410><s%> of truth. <S%H571><s%>
I have hated <S%H8130><s%> them that regard <S%H8104><s%> lying <S%H7723><s%> vanities: <S%H1892><s%> but I trust <S%H982><s%> in the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

I will be glad <S%H1523><s%> and rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in your mercy: <S%H2617><s%> for you have considered <S%H7200><s%> my trouble; <S%H6040><s%> you have known <S%H3045><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> in adversities; <S%H6869><s%>
And have not shut <S%H5462><s%> me up into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the enemy: <S%H341><s%> you have set <S%H5975><s%> my feet <S%H7272><s%> in a large <S%H4800><s%> room. <S%H4800><s%>

Have mercy <S%H2603><s%> on me, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> for I am in trouble: <S%H6887><s%> my eye <S%H5869><s%> is consumed <S%H6244><s%> with grief, <S%H3708><s%> yes, my soul <S%H5315><s%> and my belly. <S%H990><s%>

For my life <S%H2416><s%> is spent <S%H3615><s%> with grief, <S%H3015><s%> and my years <S%H8141><s%> with sighing: <S%H585><s%> my strength <S%H3581><s%> fails <S%H3782><s%> because of my iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> and my bones <S%H6106><s%> are consumed. <S%H6244><s%>

I was a reproach <S%H2781><s%> among all <S%H3605><s%> my enemies, <S%H6887><s%> but especially <S%H3966><s%> among my neighbors, <S%H7934><s%> and a fear <S%H6343><s%> to my acquaintance: <S%H3045><s%> they that did see <S%H7200><s%> me without <S%H2351><s%> fled <S%H5074><s%> from me.
I am forgotten <S%H7911><s%> as a dead <S%H4191><s%> man out of mind: <S%H3820><s%> I am like a broken <S%H6><s%> vessel. <S%H3627><s%>

For I have heard <S%H8085><s%> the slander <S%H1681><s%> of many: <S%H7227><s%> fear <S%H4032><s%> was on every <S%H5437><s%> side: <S%H5439><s%> while they took counsel <S%H3245><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me, they devised <S%H2161><s%> to take <S%H3947><s%> away my life. <S%H5315><s%>
But I trusted <S%H982><s%> in you, O LORD: <S%H3068><s%> I said, <S%H559><s%> You are my God. <S%H430><s%>
My times <S%H6256><s%> are in your hand: <S%H3027><s%> deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of my enemies, <S%H341><s%> and from them that persecute <S%H7291><s%> me.
Make your face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%> on your servant: <S%H5650><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> me for your mercies' <S%H2617><s%> sake.

Let me not be ashamed, <S%H954><s%> O LORD; <S%H3068><s%> for I have called <S%H7121><s%> on you: let the wicked <S%H7563><s%> be ashamed, <S%H954><s%> and let them be silent <S%H1826><s%> in the grave. <S%H7585><s%>

Let the lying <S%H8267><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%> be put to silence; <S%H481><s%> which speak <S%H1696><s%> grievous <S%H6277><s%> things proudly <S%H1346><s%> and contemptuously <S%H937><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the righteous. <S%H6662><s%>

Oh how <S%H4100><s%> great <S%H7227><s%> is your goodness, <S%H2898><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have laid <S%H6845><s%> up for them that fear <S%H3373><s%> you; which you have worked <S%H6466><s%> for them that trust <S%H2620><s%> in you before <S%H5048><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men! <S%H120><s%>

You shall hide <S%H5641><s%> them in the secret <S%H5643><s%> of your presence <S%H6440><s%> from the pride <S%H7407><s%> of man: <S%H376><s%> you shall keep them secretly <S%H6845><s%> in a pavilion <S%H5521><s%> from the strife <S%H7379><s%> of tongues. <S%H3956><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> for he has showed me his marvelous <S%H6381><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> in a strong <S%H4692><s%> city. <S%H5892><s%>

For I said <S%H559><s%> in my haste, <S%H2648><s%> I am cut <S%H1629><s%> off from before <S%H5048><s%> your eyes: <S%H5869><s%> nevertheless <S%H403><s%> you heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications <S%H8469><s%> when I cried <S%H7768><s%> to you.

O love <S%H157><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> you his saints: <S%H2623><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> preserves <S%H5341><s%> the faithful, <S%H539><s%> and plentifully <S%H3499><s%> rewards <S%H7999><s%> the proud <S%H1346><s%> doer. <S%H6213><s%>
Be of good courage, <S%H2388><s%> and he shall strengthen <S%H553><s%> your heart, <S%H3824><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> you that hope <S%H3176><s%> in the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
